short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A thrilling virtual airplane game. Test your flying skills with this game!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you a good pilot? Do you love a good challenge? Test your skills with this game! This is also a good training ground for every Aviator game enthusiasts out there.

You can support the game here:
